body.name: FACGGJL Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaners Best Rated,Three in-one Lightweight Stick Vacuum 14KPA Powerful Suction ，Double dust Cup Design Corded Vacuum(23ft-Cord)，for Home,Carpet,pet Hair,Floor.
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Three-in-One Stick vacuum cleaner】Best corded stick vacuum that can be easily converted into a stick vacuum cleaner by adding a handle and floor nozzle. Very suitable for handling difficult to reach areas such as stairs, carpet,pet hair,floorand curtains
【Unique double-layer cup design】Hardwood floor vacuum double-layer cup design can reduce the blockage of Haipa, thus working more efficiently.
【14KPA super strong suction force】Corded vacuum cleaner can easily capture dust, debris, pet hair, and other debris. Thoroughly clean your entire home.
【Easy to Store】Stick vacuum with cord Lightweight and small design stick vacuum cleaner，easy to use, and can be put into the desk drawer for storage after disassembly to keep everything organized.

【23Ft Long Cord 】Pet stick vacuum ultra long power cord can work without charging, without the need for frequent charging or battery replacement. An ultra long power cord allows you to clean every corner of the room without changing the power outlet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This handheld vacuum exceeded my expectations with its powerful suction, sleek design, and comfortable handle. The lightweight distribution and generous 23-foot cord make it easy to reach everywhere without changing the power outlet. The swiveling floor head and various attachments, including an upholstery tool and brush nozzle allow effortless cleaning around edges, corners, and under furniture. I am very satisfied with using it to suck in areas that are difficult to reach under the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Im only giving it three stars for now because i just got it today and only tried it for a few minutes. Its nice that the floor attachment swivles but sometimes it swivled too much-but thats no biggie. Piece if cake to put together. The cord is LONG, almost too long-i only have a small apartment-but again no biggie. The cup is small, which i knew, so youll need to empty it after every use. Im very optimistic about this purchase. I will do another review after having it for a few weeks. Looking good so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value for money
reviews.reviewText: Ok how is something so cool so cheap? Totally worth the money. Great suction, super light and I love how it goes from handheld to full length. Plus so slim so easy to get into hard to reach nooks under couches and all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: We love this vacuum. Its easy and light-weight. We have a great big bulky vacuum that hasn't been used since getting this one. Pros: easy to use, plug and go. Came with attachments for different type of messes. Its easy to change out the attachments. Easy to empty, and put back. Cons: not wireless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Extremely difficult to take apart but has great suction
reviews.reviewText: A lot of people collect things, whether it be coins, baseball cards, etc. I know this is strange but I like vacuums. Not to the point of having more than 7 but I am always looking for the next best vacuum. I have from the top-of-the-line to bottom of the line. I usually like to make a video, but it was impossible to make myself a video of me using this vacuum because my children were home. I do not post them, ever. I put together this vacuum and the first one I wanted to try, was vacuuming the hardwood floors downstairs. I have many rooms downstairs that are hardwood floors and only my family room and three season room are carpeted. Once I put it together, I could not stand it up. It is too top-heavy and therefore would come crashing down onto the floor. The pro about this vacuum is that it does have great suction. It was able to clean my hardwood floors and easily glide over to my family room. The suction was strong enough that it picked up the oriental rug that I have in the entryway. That was impressive. I then wanted to do my stairs which are hardwood a runner. I could not take the bottom part off. It certainly did not glide off, and I tried many ways to try to take it off without ruining the vacuum. I finally was able to. Actually, my teenage son did it for me. I am not a week person. It was extremely difficult. Once again, it did have great suction, but I could not take off the stair extension. This found to be a large con. If someone lived in a smaller home or apartment and they don’t have a lot of storage, and was unable to take apart the vacuum, that would have to lay it down somewhere because of how top heavy it is. I have clients who live in Manhattan where their condo is less than 900 ft.² but it is a multimillion dollar home for them. They have to come up with ingenious ways to store multiple things that I can easily put in my utility room. I would give this vacuum 2 1/2 stars if I could. It’s great for suction, but so hard to interchange the attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product! I tried it and the suction is so strong. It is a lot better than my portable vacuum. I checked their label. The portable one runs 130W and this one runs 350W in terms of power. I think this explains the great suction. Even more, it looks more expensive than it actually is. Very worthy product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Packs a little punch!
reviews.reviewText: Nifty little vacuum! It has some quirks but it’s a decent value and does work well. Out of the box you do have to assemble and attach the tube pieces together. They don’t especially fit well or click when you put them together - you really have to just push them and I didn’t feel like I could ever get them to snap all the way together. The machine is easy to operate with the single power button. It was a little tricky to get the bin chamber off the bin to empty the dust. One thing I love is how narrow and thin the tube and the attachments are. I can reach into my smaller spots than my Dyson. Shortening the length isn’t easy because the pieces don’t assemble easily. The machine isn’t especially have y to hold in my opinion. The size is pretty petite compared to my other vacuums. The suction is good! I had low expectations but the suction was pretty efficient. The only accessory I didn’t love is the larger 3 in 1 dust head. It sort of swivels and does its own thing and is lightweight and difficult to control. The cord is nice and long and it does include hooks for wrapping the cord. Overall a nifty vacuum. It isn’t perfect and wouldn’t replace a full size vacuum in our home but we have this on our second floor and it’s a lifesaver to easily vacuum dust or small messes. Is much more powerful than I expected it to be!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim and sleek
reviews.reviewText: Really liked the overall design of this vaccum. Always wanted a Dyson like vacuum. This is a really good vacuum cleaner. It is not wireless. I do not like wireless vacuum because I don’t like to charge in between when I am cleaning. It has very powerful suction.Hence for someone looking for a Dyson style wired vacuum for a really good price, this is the right product.
